subject: The Profit Benefits: RESPOND TO GET DETAILS.
body:
Carefully watch the attached video.

Attention dear friend,
I hope this letter finds you well.

NOTE THIS GREAT / GOOD NEWS: With just little $50 in your hands for buying the de-coding Spray (DCS) , I will ship you $70,000 (Seventy thousand) of this funds/ (GreenCards) for clean up and confirmation of authenticity with your bank before we proceed for the rest. (WATCH THE VIDEO, READ ALL CAREFULLY TO UNDERSTAND BETTER) - NO JOKE!

Actually, if you can handle the experiment as shown in the Attached Video we will work together for future benefits. I have a total OF $20MILLION (Twenty Million DollarsUSD) worth of the attached GreenishCards all in $100 Bills, (see attached Video sample shown on a decoding of a single $100. These funds disguised as GreenCards are original USA dollars bills, as the coating was just to aid us for a successful delivery out of my country to yours for profitable investment.

Hence I am still an active politician not allowed by Law to operate a foreign account, a Chinese scientist helped develop this greenishcoated means to easily move the fund abroad. Coating funds greenish doesn't make it fake. I contacted you because I can easily ship these GreenCards successfully to your address once I get your absolute trust. On 1st February, 2023, I did a trial of this by shipping $6Million to a Mexican, he confirmed cleaning the total in one hour, sent me $10,000 via bank wire, and when asked for more, he switched of his phone and disappeared, making it difficult to trust again.

THE DE-CODING SPRAY CALLED (D-C-S) :
The Airline that delivers the GREENCARDS tagged the (DCS) as not AirWorthy and declined delivery, which makes it harder to be transported. If you have an idea of handling the production of dangerous / flammable chemicals? You'll be sent the formula to prepare the (DCS) all by yourself . But if you don't, kindly go buy ready made and ready to use with just $50 for a start, once decoding process starts and funds realized by you, we'll buy more decoding spray (DCS) from the money you just realized to enable us clean all.

Although the production process of (D-C-S)
is extremely dangerous that a novice can set the entire city ablaze but once finally prepared, it's always human friendly, no FUMES, odorless, colorless, non-repugnant, non-repulsive,non-corrosive, AND nonflammable. A smart survey has it that GreenCards Worth of $50,000.00 [Fifty thousand USD], can conveniently be decoded by DCS worth of $200 within 10 minutes time.

I will reward you with 30% of $20Million, while 70% still comes back to me for investment in any lucrative business in your Country. There is no risk factor in this as far as I can guarantee. I want us to start this low key, little by little, which means you can buy the decoding Spray of  $50 against my shipment of $50,000 to you,

VERY IMPORTANT WARNING: For one major reason, do not ever request receiving some GreenCards samples first before buying the de-coding Spray of $50. The good reason being that, The "decoding Spray" has a Production Statistics Formula (PSF) , which is needed before shipment of GreenCards for effective decoding. When you buy, the seller will give you this (PSF) 16digits formula, which you'll forward to me for a guide me to finetune the temperature by which the GreenCards will be shipped to your address for maximum performance.

If you are in agreement, kindly send the following below while i guide you carefully on how to contact the decoding Spray seller to enable you get the $50 worth for your trial experience,
[A] Your Name
[B] Your Phone
[C] Your address
[C] A copy of your identification

I greatly appreciate the time taken to read this letter and look forward to your urgent response in addressing the matter squarely.

Sincerely,
Mr. James Hennager.

subject: Re: The Profit Benefits: RESPOND TO GET DETAILS.
body:
Hello Mr. James Hennager,

I hope this message finds you in good health and high spirits. I must say, your letter is quite intriguing! The concept of decoding disguised funds using a special spray is something I've never heard of before. It's fascinating how technology and science can be used in such unique ways.

I watched the attached video and it was indeed very informative. However, I have a few questions that I'd like to clarify if you don't mind.

Firstly, could you please explain more about the Spray DCS? How does it work exactly? And why is it tagged as not dangerous by the airline?

Secondly, you mentioned that the production process of this spray is extremely dangerous. Could you elaborate on this? What are the risks involved?

Lastly, you mentioned about a Production Statistics Formula (PSF). Could you tell me more about this formula? How does it help in decoding?

I'm sorry for all these questions but I'm just trying to understand better. Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Diana

subject: Re: The Profit Benefits: RESPOND TO GET DETAILS.
body:
Hello Mr. James Hennager,

I hope this message finds you in good health and high spirits. I must say, your letter is quite intriguing! The concept of decoding disguised funds using a special spray is something I've never heard of before. It's fascinating how technology and science can be used in such unique ways.

I watched the attached video and it was quite informative, although I must admit, some parts were a bit complex for me to understand fully. Could you perhaps explain a bit more about how this decoding process works? And what exactly is this Production Statistics Formula (PSF) you mentioned?

Also, I'm curious about the DCS spray. Is it something that's readily available in the market or does one need special permissions to purchase it? 

As for your proposal, it sounds like an interesting opportunity but I would like to know more details before making any decisions. For instance, what kind of investment opportunities are you considering in my country? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Diana

body:
